dao.name: QRY_OPEN_RF_COUNT
dao.statement: select COUNT(*) as openRfCount from open_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and shop_dat = :shop_dat and trim(shift_cod) = trim(:shift_cod)

dao.name: QRY_OPEN_RF_COUNT_BY_OPEN_MAN
dao.statement: select count(*) as openrfcount from open_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(open_man) = trim(:open_man)

dao.name: QRY_OPEN_TIMES_AND_OPEN_DAT
dao.statement: select nvl(open_times,0) open_times, lopen_dat open_dat from open_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and shop_dat = :shop_dat and trim(shift_cod) = trim(:shift_cod)
